title: Recruitment System
description: An application that provides a job portal and can be used to recruit potential candidates and manage the recruitment process.
short_description: Mobile application for job portals and recruitment processes so that they can be clearly monitored from the user and recruiter side.

goals.description: Create a job portal that can display a list of companies that are currently recruiting new employees, create personal data (CV) and help candidates monitor and manage the course of the recruitment process to provide recruitment reports.
